67174
Test: public void testLenient() throws Exception { StdDateFormat f = StdDateFormat.instance; StdDateFormat f2 = f.clone(); f2.setLenient(false); f2.setLenient(true); f2.setLenient(false); StdDateFormat f3 = f2.clone(); Date dt = f3.parse("2015-11-30"); try { f3.parse("2015-11-32"); fail("Should not pass"); } catch (ParseException e) { verifyException(e, "can not parse date"); } f3.setLenient(true); dt = f3.parse("2015-11-32"); }
Code: public void setLenient(boolean enabled) { Boolean newValue = enabled; if (_lenient != newValue) { _lenient = newValue; _clearFormats(); } }
